goal.en: The objective of this course is to strengthen the fundametal concept of transport phnomena in crystal growth of students and guide them to understand how to apply it into a real physical system.
goal.ch: 強化學生晶體生長輸送現象基本觀念的了解及工程實物應用

content.en:
1. Crystal growth methods
2. Heat and mass transports in crystal growth
3. Segregation phenomena in crystal growth from the melt
4. Effects of flow on morphological stability
5. Silicon Crystal Growth Process
6. Sapphire Crystal Growth Process
7. CVD Crystal Growth Process“
